entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Percé
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
